title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IX, pt. 224 - Suitability and Best Interests in Life Insurance and Annuity Transactions
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IX, pt. 224

Statutory authority: Financial Services Law, §§
202, 301, 302; Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 308, 309, 2110, 2123, 2208, 3209, 4226, 4525, art. 24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
